channel.title: [PI] Buy 50/Buy X
channel.description:
I can't find anything in the client which allows me to edit the Buy options, players on my server are sick of having to click "Buy 10" over and over.
I have Notepad++ and I searched through my whole client folder for "Buy 10" but nothing came up.
Any ideas?
